text: Hey :wave: have you created pages using your theme or are you currently previewing the pages using the design manager previewer (added screenshot of design manager previewer below)? Fort he menu, do you have a menu set up in your portal (more info on how to do this here: <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/website-pages/set-up-your-site-s-navigation-menus>)?

Hey y'all! :catcoder:
New minor release of boilerplate (v3.3: <https://github.com/HubSpot/cms-theme-boilerplate/releases/tag/v3.3.0>)! There are a few minor feature enhancements including heading classes in theme overrides CSS, rich text fields instead of text fields, and double quotes instead of single quotes in HubL. Please check out the release notes for more details!
